definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: "La Jara" is in local dialect the name for "gravel".
sentences.chinese: “拉加拉”是當地方言中的“砂石”。

sentences.english: You cut off gravel trucks and those blue Varica trucks.
sentences.chinese: 你會擋在砂石車和藍色威利小貨卡前面。

sentences.english: A sidestream from the de-aeration tower feeds two sand filters and a calcium reactor.
sentences.chinese: 曝氣塔兩側中的兩側是砂石過濾器和鈣反應堆。

sentences.english: The paper mainly discusses the executing technology for the treated foundation in the sand subcrust.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要論述了砂石墊層處理地基的施工工藝。

sentences.english: A diesel switcher of a road material field which is located in former Chian-Chi Coal Mine hopper.
sentences.chinese: 位於原建基煤礦落煤場之砂石給配廠所使用的調車機。

sentences.english: Concrete with river gravel or quartzite aggregate is of medium difficulty to cut.
sentences.chinese: 溪砂石骨料混凝土或石英岩身材中等難度降低。

sentences.english: A dead tree stands to the right of a tumbledown brownstone house.
sentences.chinese: 在一座破敗的褐砂石房子的右側，矗立着一棵枯樹。

sentences.english: In rural locations, your driveway may be a simple dirt or gravel road.
sentences.chinese: 在農村地區，你的車可能是一種簡單的污垢或砂石路。

sentences.english: Be sure to wash the gravel thoroughly before adding it to your tank.
sentences.chinese: 一定要洗砂石徹底煮熟纔可添加到您的智囊團。

sentences.english: China is rich in marine sandy and stony soil.
sentences.chinese: 我國具有豐富的海洋砂石土資源。

sentences.english: Apart from the Super Special Stage which was in gravel, all the stages were on concrete.
sentences.chinese: 本站比賽除超級短道爲砂石路面外其餘均爲水泥路面。

sentences.english: Often urine mainly from sand and gravel permits, Chinese medicine called "Shilin."
sentences.chinese: 常以小便排出砂石爲主證，中醫稱之爲“石淋”。

sentences.english: When Jake comes home to his Westside brownstone, it's to an extended family.
sentences.chinese: 當傑克回家他西城赤褐色砂石，這是一個大家庭。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
